title: niddiraiyil vandu
sahitya:
niddiraiyil vandu nenjil iDam koNDa uttaman yArODi tOzhi


anupallavi

  kaNNan enrAl avan kaiyinil kuzhalillai kandan enrAl avan kaiyil Or vEl illai


caraNam    cittam taDumArudaDi avan sheida kurumbennai vATTudaDi attanaiyum ingu sholvadenrAl manam 
anjudaDi anbu minjudaDi ittanai inbam nAn kaNDadillai adai eNNi pArttAl manam bhinnamaDaiyudaDi
